title: Where location 'A' refers to the location where tenements coming to MHADA's share under the Scheme are required to be given
clause_text: Where location 'A' refers to the location where tenements coming to MHADA's share under the Scheme are required to be given. Location 'B' is the new location where such tenements are allowed to be
